web_snippets: Daily Inspiration: Meet Matt Duff. Avatar photo. Local Stories ... The podcast is a way to heat a case back up and get people talking again.
Matt Duff is a private investigator and former TV producer. He's recently captured national attention for his investigative podcast work.
Matt Duff is a former Major League Baseball pitcher for the St. Louis Cardinals. He grew up in Alligator, Mississippi, along the banks of the Mississippi river.
